pma:database.name: ideaboarddb
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `boards` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL, `name` text NOT NULL, `description` text NOT NULL, `enabled` int(11) NOT NULL, `icon` text NOT NULL, `votingMechanicsId` int(11) NOT NULL, `isDeleted` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `deletedBy` int(11) NOT NULL, `deletedOn` int(11) NOT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `comments` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL, `ideaId` int(11) NOT NULL, `userId` int(11) NOT NULL, `voteType` int(11) NOT NULL, `dateCreated` int(11) NOT NULL, `comment` longtext NOT NULL, `isDeleted` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `ideas` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL, `userId` int(11) NOT NULL, `boardId` int(11) NOT NULL, `dateCreated` int(11) NOT NULL, `htmlCode` longtext NOT NULL, `isDeleted` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;
CREATE TABLE `teams` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL, `name` text NOT NULL, `profileImg` text NOT NULL, `users` text NOT NULL, `isDeleted` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `users` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL, `email` text NOT NULL, `fName` text NOT NULL, `lName` text NOT NULL, `password` text NOT NULL, `profileImg` longtext NOT NULL, `preferences` longtext NOT NULL, `permissions` longtext NOT NULL, `isDeleted` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `deletedBy` int(11) NOT NULL, `deletedOn` int(11) NOT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `votingmechanics` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL, `name` text NOT NULL, `description` text NOT NULL, `enabled` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `values` longtext NOT NULL, `isDeleted` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;
